projects.name: Household Expense Forecaster
projects.details: AI-powered web application for predicting monthly household expenses over a 36-month period (2025-2027). Trained on financial institution data using SARIMAX, Prophet, and XGBoost models.

projects.name: Equalizer Simulation
projects.details: Web-based audio signal processing tool. Utilizes Z-Transform principles to visualize frequency response graphs and mathematical filter equations.

projects.name: Rice Pledging Management System
projects.details: A comprehensive database management system for the government rice pledging scheme. Covers the entire workflow from farmer deposit, warrant issuance to G2G export contracts.

projects.name: Rudeboy's Books
projects.details: A personal knowledge base and documentation website summarizing core computer engineering concepts. Currently covers Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) and Data Structures & Algorithms 2. Built using GitBook.

projects.name: Quoridor
projects.details: A 2D simulation of the 'Quoridor' board game developed with Object-Oriented Programming principles.

technologies.details: C/C++, Java, Python, JavaScript, PHP, SQL, HTML/CSS
Git, Github, Docker, Visual Studio Code, Office 365

details: Conduct lab briefings and provide guidance on fundamental Python programming concepts.
Grade laboratory assignments, check attendance, and manage coursework scores for undergraduate students.

activities.name: POSN Computer Camp 1
activities.place: Silpakorn University, Sanam Chandra Palace Campus
activities.details: Selected to participate in The Promotion of Academic Olympiad and Development of Science Education Foundation under the patronage of Her Royal Highness Princess Galyani Vadhana Krom Luang Naradhiwas Rajanagarindra (POSN) Camp 1 in Computer.

activities.name: Academic Staff (Autonomous Robot Development Competition)
activities.details: Lectured on robotics fundamentals and control commands. Served as a mentor for competitors, offering consultation on code debugging and problem-solving strategies.

educations.head: B.Eng. Computer Engineering
educations.details: Faculty of Engineering at Kamphaeng Saen, Kasetsart University, TH. 2023-2027 (Expected)

educations.head: High School Diploma (Science–Mathematics–Technology and Environment Program)
